wikipedia_page.main: George Johnstone Jeffrey was a Scottish minister who served as Moderator of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland in 1952.

link_mentions.page: List of Moderators of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland
response: *1952 George Johnstone Jeffrey (Glasgow: Sherbrooke St Gilbert's)
Past ministers include Very Rev George Johnstone Jeffrey from around 1928 to 1952 when he was elected Moderator of the General Assembly of the Church of Scotland.
